com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.concept_insights.v2

Class ConceptInsights

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.WatsonService
      • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.concept_insights.v2.ConceptInsights

  • public class ConceptInsights
extends WatsonService
    The IBM Watsonâ„¢ Concept Insights service provides APIs that enable you to work with concepts and identify conceptual associations in the content that you provide as input to the service. Input content is auto-tagged against a concept graph, which is a formal representation of the relationship(s) between concepts. The concept graph used by the Concept Insights service is based on content that has been ingested from the English language Wikipedia.
    Version:
    v2
    See Also:
    Concept Insights

      • conceptualSearch

        public QueryConcepts conceptualSearch(Corpus corpus,
                                      Map<String,Object> parameters)
        Performs a conceptual search within a corpus.
        Parameters:
        corpus - the corpus
        parameters - The parameters to be used in the service call ids is required.
        • RequestedFields concept_fields - Additional fields to be included in the concept objects.
        • RequestedFields document_fields - Additional fields to be included in the document objects.
        • String ids - JSON array of concept and/or document ids.
        • Integer cursor - A number of items to skip.
        • Integer limit - The maximum number of concepts to be returned.
        Returns:
        QueryConcepts

      • getConceptRelatedConcepts

        public Concepts getConceptRelatedConcepts(Concept concept,
                                          Map<String,Object> parameters)
        Searches for graph concepts from a Concept by using partial matches.
        Parameters:
        concept - the concept
        parameters - The parameters to be used in the service call.
        • RequestedFields concept_fields - Additional fields to be included in the concept objects.
        • Integer level - A number in the range 0 - 3 that represents the level of popularity of related concepts.
        • Integer limit - The maximum number of concepts to be returned.
        Returns:
        Concepts

        Searches for graph concepts by using partial matches.

        graph - the graph
        concepts - the concepts
        parameters - The parameters to be used in the service call, graph and concepts are required.
        • RequestedFields concept_fields - Additional fields to be included in the concept objects.
        • Integer level - A number in the range 0 - 3 that represents the level of popularity of related concepts.
        • Integer limit - The maximum number of concepts to be returned.
        Returns:
        Concepts

      • listDocuments

        public Documents listDocuments(Corpus corpus,
                               Map<String,Object> parameters)
        Retrieves the document ids of a corpus.
        Parameters:
        corpus - the corpus
        parameters - The parameters to be used in the service call.
        • String concept - The concept name.
        • String query - For query syntax see API Explorer.
          JSON object that allows to filter the list of documents. Valid values are {"status":"error"}, {"status":"processing"}, and {"status":"ready"} which allow to filter documents by status.
        • Integer cursor - The number of possible items to return. Specify '0' to return the maximum value of 100,000...
        • Integer limit - The number of possible concepts to return..
        Returns:
        Documents

      • listGraphs

        public Graphs listGraphs()
        Retrieves the available Graphs.
        Returns:
        the Graphs

      • searchCorpusByLabel

        public Matches searchCorpusByLabel(Corpus corpus,
                                   Map<String,Object> parameters)
        Searches for documents and concepts by using partial matches on the label(s) fields.
        Parameters:
        corpus - the corpus
        parameters - The parameters to be used in the service call query is required.
        • RequestedFields concept_fields - Additional fields to be included in the concept objects.
        • RequestedFields document_fields - Additional fields to be included in the document objects.
        • Boolean concepts - Whether to return concepts that have a label match.
        • String query - The query string.
        • Boolean prefix - Whether the query string should be treated as a prefix.
        • Integer limit - The maximum number of concepts to be returned.
        Returns:
        Matches

      • searchGraphsConceptByLabel

        public Matches searchGraphsConceptByLabel(Graph graph,
                                          Map<String,Object> parameters)
        Searches for graph concepts by using partial matches.
        Parameters:
        graph - the graph
        parameters - The parameters to be used in the service call, account_id, graph and query are required.
        • String account_id - The account identifier.
        • String graph - The graph name.
        • String query - The query string.
        • Boolean prefix - Whether the query string should be treated as a prefix.
        • Integer limit - The maximum number of items to be returned.
        • RequestedFields concept_fields - An additional fields to include in the concept objects.
        Returns:
        Matches
